ComicInfo.Summary: Jackie Estacado and his gang of highly specialized criminals are on a quest to destroy all of The Sovereign’s remaining vessels. Their hunt takes them to a seemingly impossible target – Fort Knox. Can The Darkness break into the unbreakable? Featuring a brand new cover by Tom Feister (Ex Machina, Green Lantern/Sinestro Corps Secret Files).

ComicInfo.Title: The Hunting Party, Part 1
